      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static cuda.CUstream_st cuda.CU_STREAM_LEGACY()
      Legacy stream handle Stream handle that can be passed as a CUstream to use an implicit stream with legacy synchronization behavior.
      static cuda.CUstream_st cuda.CU_STREAM_PER_THREAD()
      Per-thread stream handle Stream handle that can be passed as a CUstream to use an implicit stream with per-thread synchronization behavior.
      static cuda.CUstream_st cuda.cudaStreamLegacy()
      Legacy stream handle Stream handle that can be passed as a cudaStream_t to use an implicit stream with legacy synchronization behavior.
      static cuda.CUstream_st cuda.cudaStreamPerThread()
      Per-thread stream handle Stream handle that can be passed as a cudaStream_t to use an implicit stream with per-thread synchronization behavior.

      Get the NPP CUDA stream.
